definition: In the early hours of the day, typically referring to the time between midnight and noon. It is commonly used to indicate the specific time of day when activities or events occur, such as morning routines, appointments, or scheduled activities.

examples.english: In the morning, I always eat muesli.
I get up early in the morning.
I like to drink coffee in the morning.
I often go jogging in the morning.
I read the newspaper in the morning.
